definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: In fact, the R&D pipeline for new antimicrobials has practically run dry.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，研發規劃中新的抗菌藥幾乎已經枯竭。

sentences.english: Please avoid taking other antibacterial when it is administrated.
sentences.chinese: 服用本品時應避免與抗菌藥合用。

sentences.english: Prulifloxacin, a new prodrug of ulifloxacin, is a broad-spectrum oral fluoroquinolone antibacterial agent.
sentences.chinese: 普利沙星是新口服的氟喹諾酮類抗菌藥。

sentences.english: We have taken antibiotics and other antimicrobials for granted.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經對各種抗生素和其他抗菌藥習以爲常。
